main: ^Diego Silang or Diego Silang y Andaya was born on December 16, 1730 at Aringay, Pangasinan. He is a Filipino revolutionary leader who allied with British forces to overthrow Spanish rule in the northern Philippines and establish an independent Ilocano state.

c-0: ^Diego Silang met an Itneg woman with the name of Gabriela Carino that is later known as Gabriela Silang
^The cause of his death is that he was assassinated by his friend who is mestizo or mixblood of Spanish and Ilocanoon May 28, 1763.
